title: Heritage Houses — Full-Stack Django App
description: A full-stack Django application for showcasing and managing heritage properties, built as a Code Institute milestone project.

title: Battleship — Browser Strategy Game
description: A browser-based recreation of the classic Battleship game with turn-based player vs CPU, grid rendering, and clear hit/miss feedback.

title: My Precious — Collection Tracker
description: Django-based CRUD app for managing a personal collection, with login required before accessing entries.

title: HangMan — Word Guessing Game
description: A browser-based hangman-style game built to practice JavaScript DOM manipulation, game state management, and responsive UI.

title: Vampyre — A Vampire History Site
description: This project was built to demonstrate clean semantic HTML, responsive design, image handling, a 404 page, and accessibility features.
